api_list.api_description: Get geolocation information for a given IP address.
Get information about a color in various formats and its contrasting text colors.

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: The color in Keyword, HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL, or HSLA format.

query: Can you determine the geolocation details of the IP address 8.8.8.8 and provide the complementary color information for aquamarine?

api_list.api_description: Get WHOIS data for a given domain name.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain name for the WHOIS lookup.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a color in various formats and its contrasting text colors.

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: The color in Keyword, HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL, or HSLA format.

query: Could you provide the WHOIS information for the domain 'example.com' and also get me the color details for the color '556677' in HEX format?
